intro: Psychotria djumaensis var. djumaensis, commonly known as the Djumaensis Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, particularly the Democratic Republic of the Congo. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to greenish-white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in lowland rainforests. The species is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphological features and potential ecological significance.
